name: TATIANA BOWERS
what_you_do: Tatiana Bowers is a dynamic speaker and founder of Embrace Hope Counseling and Authentic Success, blending mental health and business expertise to inspire individuals and businesses to thrive.
who_you_serve: Individuals and businesses seeking to improve relationships, leadership, and achieve success.
offering: Speaking engagements on leadership, business, health & well-being, and relationship topics; therapy services; and business relationship facilitation.
social_proof: M.A., LMFT (Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist), MHP; adjunct professor at two colleges; bachelor's in business and master's in counseling psychology; founder of two organizations.
signature_programs: "Lead Boldly, Live Fully: Transform Your Business and Your Life to the Next Level!" (speaking presentation)
business_focus: Empowering individuals and businesses through the intersection of mental health expertise and business relationship strategy.
service_provided: speaking, marriage and family therapy, business relationship facilitation, counseling, adjunct professor
